TaskDescription.Detail: Assign a value to a variable, change the value to the same type, and change value to the different type.

Assist.value: Assigns a value to the variable created in the 'variables' window.
Specify a variable to store the value. Type this.var1.
Enter the value to be stored. Type 'Hello'.
Print and check the value assigned to the variable.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.var1.
Check the data type of the variable.
Enter the variable to be checked. Type this.var1.
Enter the data type to be matched. Select string.
Print a message as below when the data type does not match string. 'This variable is not string.'
Reassigns a value of the same data type to the variable created in the 'variables' window.
Specify a variable to store the value. Type this.var1.
Enter the value to be stored. Type 'Bye'.
Print and check the value reassigned to the variable.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.var1.
Check the data type of the reassigned variable.
Enter the variable to be checked. Type this.var1.
Enter the data type to be matched. Select string.
Print a message as below when the data type does not match string. 'This variable is not string.'
Reassigns a value of the different data type to the variable created in the 'variables' window.
Specify a variable to store the value. Type this.var1.
Enter the value to be stored. Type 100.
Print and check the value reassigned to the variable.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.var1.
Check the data type of the reassigned variable.
Enter the variable to be checked. Type this.var1.
Enter the data type to be matched. Select string.
Print a message as below when the data type does not match string. 'This variable is not string.'
